title: Poster font ???
content:
I am looking for the font used in the top header for this Norma Jean poster.I have searched for it but my quest has come up blank. Any help or direction would be great. Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [51982.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202193920/http:/typophile.com/files/51982.jpg) | 381.5 KB |

 [‹ Good fonts gone bad](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202193920/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36842 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please critique my logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202193920/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36788 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jdmdrew

comments.content: Bold looks close. Except for the capital E is very distinctive. I can try to modify it. Thanks for your help. Can someone find a similar E and J. Thanks again
youre a genius...how did you find it?

Well I used it a few years ago for a poster.  
I’m glad I could help you.
